name: Trained
description: The hero is a highly skilled individual; any “powers” actually come from superior training or specialized equipment
example: WHITE HARPY was an alabino special forces operative who stoped trusting her government to do the right thing. She broke into hidden superlab, picked sonic blaster and some other toys and became a vigilante
mechanics:
Attributes Strenght, Coordination and Prowess can't be higher than 6

Powers can come only from devices

When you calculate your Stamina you can exchange   Strenght for Willpower.

You get 2 bonus random specialities and can increase your lowest attribute by +2

name: Transformed
description: The hero was a normal human but became superhuman through some outside agency, often an accident or experiment.
example: LUNAR NOVA was the the first female astronout on Moon, where she found and alien artifact which transformed her and gave her amazin ability. She also augments her powers with special suit designed by NASA
mechanics:
Hero gains one completely random power which they cannot burn to increase other powers. It's level is automatically increased by  +2

Hero needs more natural powers than powers coming from devices

name: Birthright
description: The hero was born with or destined to develop superhuman powers.
example: MULTI-PRISM was borned to the powerful mutant but was raised as an orphan. Her powers manifested when she broke a mirror on her 13th birthday
mechanics:
Hero gains one random power from type they don't already have. If they already have all types they can choose any type. This power has increased lvl by +1 and can't be burned

Hero needs more natural powers than powers coming from devices

name: Gimmick
description: The character’s powers all come from devices of some kind
example: CENTURION is boy-genius who made his suit inspired by comics he read. He hides his young age behind the mask of 7 feet cybernetic armor
mechanics:
Attributes Strenght, Coordination and Prowess can't be higher than 6

Powers can come only from devices.

Choose one device - all powers coming from it gain +1 lvl

You gain one specialty related yo your gimmick (GM choice)

name: Artificial
description: The character is a robot or some other kind of construct, such as a android or golem
example: TERRAMASTER is chinesee clay-soldier statue brought to life by a powerful spell. Infused with memories of powerful and just warrior he walks the earth to right wrongs.
mechanics:
Hero gets Life Support power at lvl 5 to represent their lack of need for sleep, food, breathing and resistance to 2 other means of harm of players choosing

You are immune to most mental attack but can be targeted by magic or technological influence

Hero can't have powers coming from devices

When you calculate your Stamina you can exchange Willpower  for Strenght.

name: Visitor
description: The character is an alien, elemental, angel, devil, or even deity—a being from another world or dimension.
example: CURSED CRUCADER was transpored to our world from alternative timeline where earth is in constant state of magical and religious wars and technology stayed at medieval level. His body is covered in magical runes giving him power and he wields magic sword
mechanics: Add 3 points in any combinations to your attributes. Attributes with values 6+ don't impact your determination.
